allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add basic LaTeX operators and symbols

This commit adds support for the following LaTeX commands:
- Multiple integrals: \iint, \iiint, \iiiint
- Logic operators: \implies, \nexists  
- Modular arithmetic: \mod, \pmod{n}

The \pmod command creates a properly formatted (mod n) expression
with parentheses and spacing.

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
